969226930963836928 2018-03-01 15:04:42 UTC <TheGr8Sarcasmo> 18) Strengthening background checks. 19) Increase waiting period on all gun sales. 20) Increase spending on mental health research and not allowing gun sales to anyone who has been reported for suicidal/homicidal reasons.

969226926647857152 2018-03-01 15:04:41 UTC <TheGr8Sarcasmo> 12) Stiffening punishments for parents who leave guns unsecured around children. 13) Before purchasing a gun you need to demonstrate proper handling and understanding of the safety rules.
